column4: hi all -- need help -- doing new ubuntu install.  Already have windows and debian partitions.   Will the install set up my new partition without erasing my other partitions?
if you tell the installer to do so, yes
but it migt be a good idea to prepare some diskspace beforehand
so i should use my partition magic to set up partition, i have 69 g's with lots of free space left

partmagic at least gives you a graphical overview... but if there's unformatted space anyway, you could let the installer do it as well... just be aware that the installer works with 1GB=1000MB, instead of 1024
